casebody.data:
JAY DEITZ & ASSOCIATES OF NASSAU COUNTY, LTD., et al., Respondents,
v.
BRESLOW & WALKER, ZLLP, et al., Appellants. Motion No: 2017-948 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on December 14, 2017

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
